title: URBANopt Thermal Junction
description: Schema for an URBANopt Thermal Junction object

id.description: Unique id used to refer to this feature within this dataset.

project_id.description: Project which this feature belongs to.

source_name.description: Name of the original data source.

source_id.description: Id of the feature in original data source.

building_id.description: Id of building if this junction is inside a building.

district_system_id.description: Id of district system if this junction is inside a district system.

pump_presence.description: Presence of pump: true if present, false if absent

connection_type.description: Characterize the connection as series or parallel

ThermalJunctionConnectionType.description: Type of connection for connectors meeting at this junction.
